content.detailedDescription: It was about 4:15 in the morning in the third week in april of 1970 just prior to the cambodian operation. we were on the yfu-79 on another ammo resupply run to dong ha and were making circles just off the mouth of the song cua viet awaiting dawn so that we could safely clear the sandbars at the entrance to the river. our position was approximately 16 deg & 55 min n lat and 107 deg 15 min e long. it was a clear night with a light wind. there were 4 of us on the duty watch. i was the helmsman and the boat's radioman. we had a deck seaman for our lookout, an engineman who was on the bridge with us, and the quartermaster was our petty officer of the deck. we had done a couple of circles off-shore and when we came around on a heading back to the north-west, we suddenly saw this tubular object hovering over the dmz close to the coast and south of the song ben hai which is the river that splits the dmz. the object did not appear to have any wings, a tail section or rotors. it was essentially a large tube-like object with red and white lights that could be seen along it's side. there was no engine noise that we could hear from it. the elevation was between 2,000 and 3,000 feet and we were perhaps 8 clicks south-east of the object. abruptly, the object accelerated to the west at a very high speed and then just as suddenly came to a dead stop. my guess is that the object was now due north of the base at dong ha. it then slowly returned to the east, hovered near the coast for 2 or 3 minutes and then proceeded slowly on a north-easterly course out over the south china sea where it disappeared from view. red and white lights could be seen on the side of the object that we could observe. they didn't alternate colors but there were 2 or 3 reds and then a white light and gave the impression of being windows or some sort of aperture in the object through which the light came. the four of us on watch debated about whether we should enter the incident into the boat's log book but opted not to since we figured that we'd either be sent off to see psychologists or brought up on drug charges. we were very familiar with all types of aircraft and helicopters that operated over the dmz. this object did not look nor behave like any aircraft we were familiar with at the time nor since.
content.flightPath: Hovering then path,Straight-line path,Path with directional change
content.summary: A tubular object with red and white lights observed over dmz

content.detailedDescription:
I was at my home on my patio having a smoke with my friend just hanging out for the night. now, for the past 2 years i have been consistently seeing things at night, random flashing/multi-colored lights, lights moving in the night sky with the ability to change direction and speed with ease that does not resemble anything like any of the aircraft i've seen or know of. i first noticed the light before my friend (army vet). because of my previous experiences i'm constantly staring at the sky at night. i first saw it slowly, from a dim to extremely bright light, just once. so i take a drag of my cigarette as i'm staring up where i saw the flash, and after the "cherry" of my cigarette lit up and dimmed from my drag the light flashed again. i pondered the thought of what i could be seeing and the possibility that it could be communication of some sort. after 4-5 more randomly taking drags of my cigarette while staring up at the and seeing the same flash immediately after my friend finally noticed the look on my face and decided to look up as well. the second he looked up and in the direction i said i was seeing this thing it flashed. he was in total disbelief after our 10 minute sighting. we watched this "flash" not only continue on slowly in the sky, but it also stopped, changed colors, but most importantly we observed it change direction which indicated to us it wasn't a satellite, airplane, or anything explainable.  we were feeling almost in a daze after and "off" after or sighting as we sat in my living discussing what we just witnessed minutes before. as we sat and tried to come to terms with what just happened, my home felt different, i don't know how to explain it and we both noticed the change in atmosphere. the second we noticed the change a broom in my coat closet under my stair, which was leaned against the back wall of the closet, lift up off the ground and slam against the door of the closet which was ajar/open about 10-12 inches. although both events, while amazing and mind boggling, cant be explained. we believe the broom in the closet was them letting us know, that they knew we saw them, and that they saw us as well.

i did attempt to video the object but was unable to get it in frame as there were no reference points for me to judge where in the sky i was pointing the camera. so its basically an audio recording of the event unfortunately.
content.summary: Friend and i observed and watched a flashing object move across the sky, experienced events after sighting inside home after.

content.detailedDescription: Coming from school with me and my father and once i saw this object in the sky i was trying to see what was around it and what it was. i was thinking it was a ufo. next it started following us down to our house i was getting scared cause it was like stalking us. next i ran into my house and i told what i saw to my mother and brother.
content.flightPath: Hovering then path,Straight-line path,Path then hovering
content.summary: Following us down a street.

content.detailedDescription: I was in my bedroom it was 8:02 p.M. and i was on the phone sitting on the bed talking to my sister i could see a  partial in between the blinds and the curtains and orange red light at a distance over the apartment and it started to move i got up peeked out the blinds and i couldn't believe what i saw i ran out the apartment door ran down the first flight of stairs looked over the balcony and there was a cigar shaped red bright red orange light that engulfed at least three-quarters of the aircraft and slow-moving slow steady moving towards the north it was so goddn more than a mile off but i could see with my human eyes exactly what it look like when it's changed  and then once the lights went out it changed shapes  to a rectangular squarish entity craft whatever and then it hoverered it looked pinkish in color it was very very very like reflective it was a nice smooth color and it started to ascend right next to it when it stopped and harvard and what look like a mist that was kind of turning into a cloud it look it started to move like it was going to hide and then it took off you didn't even see it take off it was just gone i'm before it took off before this ended when it was in its life stage i took two photos
content.flightPath: Hovering then path,Straight-line path,Path then hovering
content.summary: Cigar shaped with orange/red glow engulfed 3/4 of it slow steady movement no sound sky high human eye visual changed shape when light dissapatrf square rectangle shape ascended hovered light color pinkish mist part coved and took off to quick to notice

content.detailedDescription: I was sitting in my truck listening to lsu tigers playing baseball. it was a cool spring like night.. i got out of the truck to gaze upon the night sky and the stars. the moon was pretty bright sitting over head, so i decided to take a couple of pics of the moon and the star to the right of the moon. i didn't have my glasses on at the time i snapped the pics. after i zoomed in close enough to get the moon and star on my phone.. snapping several pics at once. the next day i reviewed the pictures i had taken the night before.. and was checking out the different pics.. when i saw the object around the 5 o'clock position. i zoomed closer to see what a star might look like on my phone.. and compared it to the next picture in the sequence when i noticed my star had changed positions from the 5 o'clock position to the 6 o'clock position. the star to the far right stayed pretty much in the same position.. but the one under the moon moved. this might be the iss? i don't know.. that's why i'm sending the 2 pics to you guys.
content.summary: Taking pics of the moon and saw object as a star.  then it moved from the 5 o'clock position to 6 o'clock  while other star stayed in position

content.detailedDescription:
Hello,

while visiting friends, i borrowed my friend's cannon dlsr to take pictures of the dark clouds moving in, shortly after alerts of a violent storm approaching.  i took a picture of the shore line, clearly showing a brick building with a white roof. i looked away from the camera and noticed a hovering dot at about 60 degrees off the horizon, north west of the previous picture.  i aimed the camera at the object. i was using a 70-300mm lens. i zoomed all the way in.  i still could only see a dot, so i snapped the picture. all a sudden before i could take another, it disappeared out of my lens view moving at a high rate of speed in a south westerly direction. since i could not see it, i swung the camera down and began clicking along the shore line, capturing as much sky as i could, but actually saw nothing with my naked eye through the lens.  

when i went inside, i used the camera to zoom in on the dot of light.  to our surprise, it looked like a boat in the sky.  i asked my friend if i could take the card home and copy the pictures i took. 

when i got the images on a full screen pc, to my surprise, there were tiny dots of light around the "boat" object in some sort of a 45 degree angled line.  i believe i found 6 dots of light.

the major surprise came when i looked at the blindly snapped picture after that. it revealed a hovering object over the brick building. in addition there is a couple of dots. one is a white dot, and the other appears, when blown up to be a gray oval shape with a black dot (dome?).

i have shown these image to jim & jack weiner, abductees the allagash incident. i'm good friends with them. i do not want to turn over the rights to these images. i'm good with examining them for authenticity, but will not assign exclusive rights to my images.  i trust mufon and the weiners and i believe these to be interesting enough for analysis.  i also think that jim said he would be sending the images to ray fowler.  if you feel you would like to investigate this, please have the local mufon investigator contact me. i've included a blow up of the dot and a few of the accompanying lights.

regards,
john flanders
content.summary: Saw  stationery dot, click, it moved down at a 45 degree angle. lost image

content.detailedDescription:
Walking to car looking up

 saw a flash like an exploding firework  about as small as an aspirin held at arms length

waited to hear sound that never occurred

 burned out as embers from a firework does.


 thought if could have been an exploding satelite with the sun reflecting on flying parts.
content.summary: Looked like satelite exploded

content.detailedDescription:
1. watching tv with my wife and children in our living room. we live up on a hill on the edge of town. 
2. i heard the beating sound of a helicopter coming by. this is fairly common but this time it started to vibrate the whole house so i stepped outside on the deck to observe. overhead passed a huge helicopter only maybe 100ft directly above.  i immediately noticed there was another craft flying next to it but it was black, no lights, no props, no apparent sound.
3. i didn't know what to think. ufo, drone, secret military stuff?
4. the dark craft seemed to be flying under cover of night and under cover of the helicopter. the helicopter was the biggest one i've ever seen. it had a single prop and tail rotar.
5. surprise, awe. 
6. it disappeared into the night and over the horizon.
content.summary: Large helicopter accompanying a black oval craft just after dusk.

content.detailedDescription:
I've decided to post this story online, and so am copying and pasting most of the article here to report it (to save having to write it twice):
----------

i've had a story to tell about the phoenix lights, but it wasn't in arizona, and it wasn't on the same day of the arizona incident. i have already told this story to several people through the years, but never in an article format, where anybody can find it online and read it. finally, with several people marking the phoenix lights anniversary online, i think it's a good time to type it up, to add to the public discussion.

when i first heard about phoenix lights, it was long after my own sighting had occurred -- maybe months, maybe years. yet other witness' accounts reminded me of a sighting i'd had around the same time, also in the southwest, and so i sat down and figured out how my sighting fit into the timeline. i calculated that my sighting was just before the phoenix lights. maybe the previous week, maybe a few days prior, but most likely the previous weekend.

basically i was in a suburb of las vegas, nevada, either in boulder city or somewhere between boulder city and las vegas. all i can say is that i was on a highway -- the "main drag" that goes from boulder city to las vegas -- going toward las vegas after dark, and i wasn't in a downtown area. it was more of a rural desert area.

at that time in my life, i was still working in los angeles, california and occasionally going to las vegas, nevada for a much-needed weekend break from the stress of the job and the l.A. metro area. it wasn't uncommon for me to find a smaller hotel in boulder city and then drive to las vegas for sightseeing, which went on 24 hours a day.

while on the highway, driving at a low rate of speed, suddenly six lights came on directly overhead. this was without warning and without noise. i looked up, and saw what looked like gymnasium lights from my childhood, and very bright. they were in a v-shape that was large enough to be 6 helicopters flying in formation, which at the time i assumed they were. the reddish sky was visible in between the lights, giving me the initial impression that the lights weren't attached to the same craft. they were also very low to the ground, and although i'm not very good at estimating heights, my best guess is somewhere between 20 and 30 feet from the ground to the lights. they also weren't entirely stationary. they were traveling in a forward motion, toward the city like my car, but very slowly.

because of what was happening in my life at the time, i was both angry and terrified when i first saw the lights. i was being stalked by a woman who was wealthy enough and mean enough to use any means possible to terrorize me. 

...And so i knew that while unlikely, there was a possibility that those helicopters worked for the stalker. i immediately drove ahead to the next side street and took a left, then turned around and watched the lights from the stop sign there. thankfully, the lights continued directly over the main road going straight ahead, past my position and toward the city of las vegas. again, i'm not good at estimating speeds from the side of the road, but it was going very slowly -- i'd guess about 20-25 m.P.H. i don't remember when i stopped watching, but knowing evasive behavior that i frequently used to escape the stalker at the time, i probably drove to what i'd consider to be a safer spot to wait it out.

when i finally heard about the phoenix lights, i remembered that incident, and started googling information on different ufos. that's when i came across a few pages on the "big black delta," a triangular-shaped craft with lights on the bottom that were in the same formation that i saw that night. yet the special thing about the big black delta was the screen on the bottom of its wings -- supposedly the aircraft had a camera that took a real-time shot of the sky above, and projected that picture onto a screen at the bottom of the plane, making people below think that they were seeing the sky in between its lights. at the time of the sighting, i didn't know that such technology existed, and so i wasn't looking for the edges of any screen as i was looking up. all i saw were the lights and the "sky" in between (which was reddish from light pollution but not very bright).

to me, the "big black delta" describes what i saw perfectly, and i've assumed that's what i saw that night in boulder city ever since. i also suspect it's a possibility for the phoenix lights (same craft, different location, different day), although i'll leave it to witnesses in arizona to decide whether it fits their memories or not.

...I have had other ufo "sightings." one was in the california desert, along the interstate between los angeles and las vegas, just over some mountains set back from the north side of the highway. it occurred on a sunny, clear day. basically an aircraft that looked like a stealth bomber was suspended in air with a metallic-colored parachute above it, which appeared to be attached to the plane with thick metal cables. although i no longer remember the year of this one, for some reason i'm under the impression that it was in 1996. and it wasn't much of a sighting, but again it was "unidentified." i've since wondered if whatever propulsion gas coming out of the back of the bomber was being caught by the parachute, and that's what was suspending it, although the thing appeared to be motionless and i'd expect some movement from a crude technology like that. i've described this sighting to other people, and some think that what i saw was a hologram and not an actual aircraft, obviously there's no way for me to know for sure what was happening in the sky that day.

another "sighting" is much more complex, starting with my mother's obsession one day to travel to horicon marsh in wisconsin, then my seeing what appeared to be a disc shadow pass in front of us on the road in the area,and then crop circles near that same marsh on a later date. this started a number of events that led me to a sick girl who needed some information that i had, and eventually i saw what some would call a "gray." that story is very long and i'm also concerned for the privacy of the humans involved and the "gray," but i was impressed with the compassion of whoever put that into motion, alien or human. maybe someday i'll be able to walk readers through the story.

for now, i'll report the old "big black delta" sighting to mufon and leave the rest of it for another time. i am interested in whether any witnesses of the phoenix lights incident think that it's similar enough to be the same aircraft.
content.summary: 6 lights hovering over my car briefly, silent and probably a "big black delta"

content.detailedDescription: Me and two friends where in the school yard of a local public school in barrie ontario, during summer break. the sky was clear blue with only a few clouds. me and my two friends would hang out there, take pictures, go to the park. when i suddenly got a weird feeling to look up and when i did i saw a disc shape greyish white saucer like ufo hovering a far distance in the sky. i thought i was seeing things. so i immediately told my two friends who where right beside who also said they are seeing it too. we took out are camera and phones to take a picture, but they where acting up, we did get a few pictures but the craft was not visible. i started to voice that i felt light headed, and weird something i still cannot explain and have troubles explaining to this day. again i voiced this feeling and my other two friend agreed they felt weird as well. we noticed it was heading into a small white cloud as it went into this cloud we waited anxiously for it to comeback out the other side. low an behold it never came out of the cloud.
content.summary: Greyish white disc shape saucer seen on a clear summer day!

content.detailedDescription: At the time me and my mom where sitting in the living room. it was freezing rain out and the power went out. we lit candles and started to talk about events,news,memories,family outings, stuff family talks about. then out of the corner of my eye in the sky i saw a flash of bluey green aka turquoise light coming from the sky. my mom saw it too! then we saw a flash of white light a few moments later, followed by a flash of red, blue lights . but the most prominent colour that was flashing was the turquoise colour. we thought it may have been lightning, but there where now veins in the sky, plus what would explain the blue,red colours, and can lightning be turquoise . it was similar to the colour of the northern lights. we did go outside an saw no unusual craft. that night 15 transformers blue an our city was blacked out for 12 hours. this city known as barrie ontario, canada. has its far shares of weirdness. from objects an ufos in the sky, to abductions, to a lake monster, and other eerie events. i thought to report it .
content.summary: Flashing lights, large 12 hour power outage, turquoise,red,blue,white,

content.detailedDescription: I observed an object moving across the sky making no sound bigger than a plane with a street light looking color amber color nothing like a plane or anything i've ever seen it's either another form of spacecraft that our government is doing or is something from another planet it was enormous you can see the size of the plane on the second video compared to the orb that i saw move across the sky....I'm not crazy.. i have an associates as a medical lab tech i'm well educated and familiar with aircraft satellites and helicopters. half awake it's late here and i have to work in the morning. video is real. look into it not edited. couldn't  get it out faster ..
content.summary: Not blinking. amber light. recorded it using galaxy s4 sorry for quality but that was not from this planet. amber light floating across  the sky as big or bigger than a plane. i recorded second video of a plane in exact spot i saw the ufo... i'm not crazy

content.detailedDescription:
On friday late evening of march 18th/16 , i've noticed through my window there was an object in white light , which was much lower then the star in the sky which was to the object's top right angle . i went out with my iphone to see if i'll be able to capture its image just as i did on the 11th .
the moon at the time was high up in the sw direction in the sky along with 2 bright stars . the object itself was in the eastern to southern part of the sky , the same spot as the above mentioned date 1 wk before .  i've actually taken 2 photos , first was of the pretty moon & sirius i believe it was , then it was the 2nd photo that i've captured the image of the ufo once the brightness became more clearer , the object looks ok on the pic , which i'm attaching with this report . 
i wasn't going to report this day's sighting , however i was compelled to go ahead with it since i've noticed a report of the same date , report # 75394 from richmond hill , which is the northern part of the greater toronto area ( gta ) , so it would be easier for mufon to compare both sightings ;]
content.summary: Was curious , below a star seemed there was an 'object' , so i went out to take photos .

content.detailedDescription: i live at 533 stanton st., arroyo grandy california i live out in the country there's a large eucalyptus trees all around i've seen these trees many times before and never noticed any flashing lights i was on my deck taking my laundry downstairs to do it and noticed two blue flashing lights i got closer and i noticed two red flashing lights in my line of sight there was one blue light at 12 o'clock one at 6 o'clock when i got closer underneath the tree i saw one red light at 12 o'clock and one red light at 6 o'clock   the blue lights one on top was flashing the bottom was not both red lights where not flashing.  i thought to myself it might be a drone that landed in the treetop or possibly a bird nested with something that was making these lights.  i watch these objects for three hours from 7 pm to 10:30 pm march 24, 2016 about 10:26 they  disappeared and it's now 11:19 and still looking out for the lights i will  continue   as a  follower of mofon i understand and believe in this to be fact and i'm alway on the lookout for such.  i attached some videos that i took with my cell phone i apologize for the swearing. thank you for your time john godwin ..
content.summary: notice two flashing red lights got closer then noticed two blue lights

content.detailedDescription: I had just poured my first cup of coffee and walked to the front window while i waited for my coffee to cool down when a bright light hit my eye moving west one block away from house. at the time i thought how unusual it was that i should look down that street at the same time that a cop should hit me with a spotlight. what else could it be? as i sipped my still-too-hot coffee i noticed a light growing brighter coming from the west. the next thing i see registers as animation in my brain. there is a 10 to 12 foot cylinder with a really bright flattened orb rotating on top with a rectangle that emitted a beam that extended the whole block with the light of day. after scanning both sides of the street that runs to the north at the left of my driveway the craft continued west passing 25 feet in front of my house. after sunrise i went out into the street to search for any signs of the craft. although i witnessed clear signs of something molting from the bottom of the craft hovering 3 feet above the rode, there was no visible residue.
content.summary: 12 ft cylender with flated orb rotating on top, bright light scanning, molten looking something spewing from the bottem that left no visiable esidue.

content.detailedDescription:
I was driving with my children along route 256 between memphis and childress texas, on my way to oklahoma. during what appeared to be a very quiet and unlit stretch of hilly road, a very bright metallic cross-like orb suddenly appeared next to the highway. it was very shiny like modern blue metallic plane but inverted as if the cockpit was pointing upward (shape of a cross). it seemed to shake back and forth very quickly as it hovered in place with bright belt of white lights shining around the entire diameter of the strange object. 
i was talking through my blue tooth device and using gps in the car when both suddenly stopped working. the radio, gps and cell phone all turned off as if there was no power in the car. 

in my uncomfortable panic, i said a quick prayer and accelerated the car to create more distance from the object. 

the object appeared slightly larger than semi-truck trailer in width and maybe 10-15 feet in height. as we passed i saw that its erratic shaking gave the impression of a saucer-like shape at first. but it was definitely a cross like object with a wingspan. 

my daughter watched as we passed and saw the white lights change to a blue-ish color and said that it hovered and then moved to the other side of the road behind us and appeared to land. the uncomfortable feeling of seeing something so unusual first hand caused enough concern to not want to stop or get closer. 

we reached our destination about and hour and a half later. as i provided details to my husband, he suggested that my daughter and i each go into separate rooms and draw a picture of what we thought we saw, without the other's knowledge. the pictures were almost identical.

i've never given ufos much thought before but have also never seen anything so unusual with such clarity up close. but i know what i saw was a metallic object with lights, hovering in the night sky along route 256 near childress, texas. i saw it up close and i can understand now that we shouldn't be quick to judge other people's bizarre stories...Some things are difficult to explain but you know when you see it.
content.summary: Large cross shaped orb with bright lights (white and red) was suddenly appeared at tree top height. phone and radio suddenly turned off. as i passed along highway, the orb appeared to hover & then land somewhere near where it was spotted; i did not stop.

content.detailedDescription: We were sitting on the couch watching tv at night. its an overcast night with cloud cover that has a glow to it from the lights below. we both saw at the same time a black triangle (i think maybe a diamond- we weren't seeing it straight on) fly on a straight line at a descending angle left to right across the window.  we noticed it in our periphery vision at first- it was such a dark clearly geometric shape moving against the glowing sky. it disappeared over the tree line. i  stood up to watch it as it passed and saw it fly out of sight past the tree line.  thats when my partner said, "did you just see that too?" so i knew i wasn't seeing things.  we were both surprised.  it had no lights and was fairly discreet against the dim sky.  it was totally silent and faster and lower than a plane.  it crossed into and out of sight in 6 seconds or less.   i have no idea what it is, i have been trying to figure out if it was some kind of military drone?  or other kind of ufo.  whatever it was it was very unusual, we see a lot of planes fly by but they are much further away with lights and slower. i have been trying to find out more about what it could have been ever since.
content.summary: Dark triangle or diamond shape seen, no lights against night sky

content.detailedDescription:
I wish i knew it was there as i snapped pictures of the sun. in the first photo something is above the telephone wires ... in the second photo, it is on the right edge of the photo, so i know that whatever it was, it was moving. event was really 'uneventful' because i was blinded by the sun and unaware it was there. either that, it was moving so fast that i couldn't see it with the naked eye. unsure. just thought it was worth the look and second opinion.
best regards
ruthanna
content.summary: I'm always taking pics of sunsets and this sunset was lined up with my street, so i was taking pictures of it. years pass and i'm looking through the pics and can't explain object in pic.

content.detailedDescription: My co-worker and i was travelling on state route us 224 (westbound) back from findlay, ohio on friday march 11th, 2016 @ approx. 6:45 pm.  as we was coming up to the county lines where it switches from hancock county to seneca county i noticed a super bright light right next to my rear view mirror.  i didn't pay much attention to it as i thought it might have been a local aircraft.  then all of a sudden it got even brighter and i told my co-worker, "hey look at that bright airplane over there", and no longer after i said that it vanished.  it was a very weird thing to see as i have never seen anything disappear like this thing did, ever!
content.summary: Super bright light in the sky's near a local landfill

content.detailedDescription:
Looked out window of travelling vehicle and saw this huge flaming circular thing. was told the next morning it was a russian satellite crashing. there were no reports of debris or damaged property. that was impossible! it was enormous.I could not believe what i was seeing
 later i began to try to look up news reports and internet and found nothing. it has bothered me ever since. i had to at least try to find out if anyone else has seen it or of a russian satellite had crashed over nevada.
content.summary: Flames aroun top circumpherance. under cloud bank very low, hovering blue green with flat bottom. circular shape

content.detailedDescription: White-yellow on top of its head, human like, big eyes, odd head.
content.summary: White-yellow on top of its head, human like, big eyes, odd head.

content.detailedDescription: I believe it was august of 1968 or 69, i was 5 years old when i awoke to a face looking into my bedroom window, it did not scare me at the time, i actually felt ok no fear until it was gone then i was extremely shaken only being 5 or 6 years old at the time i had no idea what i had just seen. i went out to tell my parents something looked at me threw my window and was very upset, my parents told me it was a nightmare. i wrote mufon a few years ago and i was asked to do any interview, which i choose not to do at the time. the thing is i have no idea what may have happened at the time to me. i never heard of anything like that being that young, but over the years it has bothered me to what i seen, being a young boy back then it was unheard of to see something to me. what ever it was as i am sure i seen a face looking into my bedroom and making me feel calm until it left, to this day i have not a clue what it was, but i always think of it as i had no idea what an alien was at that age and don't understand what i seen but it was a white grey face with big black eyes looking at me, i have thought about it for as long as i can remember and it just frustrates me in not knowing if i seen it or it was a nightmare, but if i was only 5 and never seen or heard of some entity like i witnessed is still unreal to me.
content.summary: I seen an entity looking into my bedroom window

content.detailedDescription:
This year i start once more my night sky observations', because i live under a highway to the ufos, this ones i used to call splash ships and they are very difficult to record with my old handy cam, i was lucky. i have registration of 4 different kind of technologies for this phenomenon.
after i see the movie it seems to me there are more than 1 object, and when i slow down the movie i was able to see a little bit more of the shape, the most bright happens at 3mnts and 53secs. this ones are very common to see under the ursula major or around. i live near lisbon, front of atlantic ocean to the south and i am at 60 mtrs above the sea line.
thank you
sal
content.summary: One more night observing ufos and then this splashing lights appear

content.detailedDescription:
On march 5,2016 i was walking my dogs along the parks of tradition square located in port saint lucie, florida. it was a beautiful sunny afternoon. while walking noticed the interesting site of a big black cloud near the sun. it was a very interesting site that got my attention because it was a clear, sunny day and that was the only very dark cloud on site. i stopped to take a picture with my phone.. while focusing and taking the first picture, noticed what appeared to be a glowing sphere with some type of diamond or triangle shape inside the glowing sphere. there where some spotlights that seems to be attached to the corners of the geometric object. this unidentified object was not flying, it was just station there (no moving at all) and while positioning my phone again to take another picture this object was gone! it just disappear. i didn't see how it vanished, i didn't see it flying anywhere! and didn't hear any sound (but it was also too far to be able to hear anything). this happened within seconds or minutes.......
.....I don't know.... i feel like during and after this experience i had lost track of time and its meaning.. maybe as if i'm in a different time zone, or living a "timeless" life. this happened a few weeks ago and i'm still trying to adjust to "time" (very difficult to explain). if necessary, i would share more in detail with a mufon associate that investigate and understand this phenomenon better than i do. i feel that it was not a coincidence or an accident, i feel this object was of a higher intelligent order and it wanted to be seem.
content.summary: Glowing sphere with a geometric object inside that seemed to have spotlights on several corners

content.detailedDescription:
November 8, 1995 at approximately 8:40p.M., in rural rosholt, wisconsin, there was a flash of light that illuminated the entire area around our house. i was in the basement and my mother and stepfather were upstairs. 

we all went to the front door and noticed an orange orb hovering over a tree line, to the south. i am not sure of the distance, but my best guess is around a half-mile. the object appeared several times the size of a star. it appeared to glow slightly, but the shape was a solid sphere. the orb hovered in the same spot for about 20 minutes. the orb then slowly descended below the tree line until what must have been close to ground level, then ascended back to the original elevation. this took approximately 30 seconds. the orb then traveled east at a speed similar to an airplane. after traveling for about ten seconds, the object reversed direction instantly, without any change in speed. the object arrived back at the original location and disappeared. 

at the same moment the orb disappeared, a circle of 8-10 large, bright lights flashed one at a time directly over the field to the south/southwest of our yard. i would say it was no more than 500 feet from our front door, and 250 feet above ground. there was no sound. i would estimate that the width of the object/lights was 75-100 feet. once the last light went out, there were no more sightings. 

we continued to look around, all of us a little "freaked out" now. after a couple of minutes, military jets flew over. i thought it sounded like they were flying to the northeast, but i couldn't be certain.

i phoned the stevens point municipal airport and reported what i saw. i was told they hadn't seen anything. i then phoned the stevens point journal newspaper. they told me that they had received multiple reports of 2 f-16s "chasing a ufo." 

the november 9 1995 stevens point journal has a front page article with a quote from a lt. col. saying that it was the 115th fighter wing of traux field in madison, wisconsin "practicing night flying." the article concludes with "the only thing they were chasing after were themselves." (i still have this newspaper if the full article is needed)
content.flightPath: Hovering then path,Path with directional change
content.summary: Flash of light illuminates our yard. orange orb hovering. it descends, ascends, travels left then reverses without slowing. another object appears. f-16s follow.

content.detailedDescription:
Dog needed to go out to do her business... and as soon as i stepped out - i saw it because it was so bright - you could not help but see it. plus it was a weird shape. not a star. i always look at night stars... this was not a star. 
as soon as i saw it i decided to get my husband (who was sleeping) to come and see it too. he was also stunned at what we saw. our first instinct was to check to see if the iss was over us - even though we knew it was not the iss as we have seen that before. we confirmed at that time the iss was not over us.
then we got our binoculars... and the brightness was overwhelming when seen through that lens. very hard to look that far up and hold binoculars. next i got my iphone to take pictures ... which i did. very hard to take a picture that far away with just the camera in my phone. 
after we went in i continued to check on it - and it was gone after 4 hours. it was not there the next night or any night  since we saw it.
content.summary: Extremely bright - not moving - occasional  red light appeared. very high up in the sky.

content.detailedDescription: I was with my 11 year old son in the car driving to collect my daughter from work. we turned left on to bridgewater road in wembley and i noticed what i thought was a plane but lights were brighter than usual. my radio turned off so was fiddling with my radio when my son pointed at the plane and told me to have a look. i then noticed the lights were in a kind of circle shape. i pulled over, just to check if the plane was at an angle that made it look circular in shape, but it wasn't, the shape was circular. i couldn't quite see the craft itself as it was dark and just an outline was visible.It was not going at any speed like you would expect a plane or helicopter it was sort of hovering but still moving slightly. i carried on driving and went through a width restriction looked up and couldn't see it. i said where has it gone and my son said it just disappeared while he was looking directly at it. radio came back on and had no problem with it since.
content.summary: Thought was plane but realised it was round and disappeared in front of us.

content.detailedDescription: On the evening of the occurrence, i was meditating out side my home with my younger brother. we finished meditating and we began to look at the stars. a short while after an orange light appeared over the woods behind my house, it emitted an odd orb of energy, that is difficult to describe... was rainbow and extended far from it. the light finally came out of the trees when my brother pulled out his cellphone. we watched this craft hovering, over our house. another craft came in suddenly, at an incredible speed, and was appearing to be at a lower altitude. they then continued on to where we couldn't see them due to trees.  the first craft seemed to have two main golden orange lights, these were very bright. it was dead silent. the second was silent as well but the light was a different color, lighter, which made it seem closer. when this craft joined the other, it stopped from an insane speed. it zipped and then stopped on a dime at the speed of the first craft.
content.summary: One initially, glowing bright, with two orange lights flew directly over my home, then a second,going extremely fast, appeared behind the other.

content.detailedDescription: Early morning, moon still on west horizon. then looked towards north, and say a planet/star no normallly there at the time. then went to star/planet software to figure out what start was there and it appeared to be  vega on the software, i was not convinced, i tried to use my new phone's compass was not working. then i opened my old phone and used compass and by then  it had moved north east. then went to  internet to find out if a comet was flying by or something. _ no info found_  i stepped outside the sun was out on the horizon at the time and the object then had moved just left of the rising sun. then i began to analyze  in my mind , how could it be so bright like a planet/star at that time of the day with the sun out. maybe its a satellite. so i went back to the star software and tried to track the satellite in the region. therw was an artificial satellite in the region. sorry did not write it down it was asian name.
content.summary: Early morning, looked towards north, and saw a planet/star not normally there at the time of the morning 6:30 est
Iss and " swamp gas " in space ...
